turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order from Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm not finding that on their coffee menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about a cold brew fog latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hmm, i'm not seeing that, is that similar to a golden caffe latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk with that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i see they offer non-fat, 2%, whole, soy, and almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and do you want your coffee iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you are ordering a medium coffee with almond milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a medium coffee with almond milk to be picked up at the peet's at reno-tahoe international airport.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
